Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://northcarolina.summerebtapp.com/begin\nGo to https://apply.mrelief.com/screener or text \"Food\" to 74544 to check eligibility.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://apply.mrelief.com/screener", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "Charlotte", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2187848, "longitude": -80.8373742}}
